about_the_game:
Your Death From Above experience doesn’t have to end when you hang up your drone for the day. Take the amazing soundtrack with you and experience the sounds of Ukraine wherever you go.

We’re incredibly proud of the Ukrainian artists who have contributed to Death From Above - their support and passion are inspiring.

In this memorable soundtrack DLC, you can experience the raw, driving rock of Antytila, in what they have described as “probably the heaviest song in our discography” - the titular Death From Above, created especially for our game. All three versions of this anthem are featured here - English, Ukrainian, and instrumental.

You’ll also be getting Zavtra from the mighty Surface Tension, a perfect 5 minutes of bouncy guitar that grabs you by the back of your neck and doesn’t let go, and the hauntingly beautiful За тобою from Odarka Zyrko - a slice of electro-folk which will follow you into your dreams, and lastly a great hit by GO_A - the Kalyna!

You’ll also be contributing directly to the defense of Ukraine by supporting our charity partners, the Army of Drones and Come Back Alive.

Slava Ukraini!

We’re incredibly proud of the Ukrainian artists who have contributed to Death From Above - their support and passion are inspiring.

In this memorable soundtrack DLC, you can experience the raw, driving rock of Antytila, in what they have described as “probably the heaviest song in our discography” - the titular Death From Above, created especially for our game. All three versions of this anthem are featured here - English, Ukrainian, and instrumental.

You’ll also be getting Zavtra from the mighty Surface Tension, a perfect 5 minutes of bouncy guitar that grabs you by the back of your neck and doesn’t let go, and the hauntingly beautiful За тобою from Odarka Zyrko - a slice of electro-folk which will follow you into your dreams, and lastly a great hit by GO_A - the Kalyna!

You’ll also be contributing directly to the defense of Ukraine by supporting our charity partners, the Army of Drones and Come Back Alive.

Slava Ukraini!
